name: Sutton Funding
desc: New York-based alternative lender using proprietary AI technology to provide merchant cash advances, term loans, lines of credit, and equipment financing up to $2M with fast approval.

leaders.bg: Sutton Funding operates from Madison Avenue in NYC, offering AI-powered lending approvals up to $2M.

name: Bitty Advance
desc: Florida-based MCA funder specializing in micro-advances ($2,000-$250,000) for small businesses under $100K annual revenue, with OppFi acquiring a 35% equity stake in 2024.

leaders.bg: Serial entrepreneur who founded, grew, and sold Rapid Capital Funding before acquiring Bitty Advance; acquired full ownership in 2020.

name: Fundomate Technologies, Inc.
desc: Los Angeles-based fintech operating the first MCA-specific search engine platform, providing white-labeled turnkey funding solutions to merchant-facing businesses with 20+ pre-approved lenders.

leaders.bg: Built Fundomate as the first search engine platform specifically designed for the merchant cash advance industry.

name: QuickSpark Financial
desc: Arizona-based equipment financing and working capital company (acquired by TimePayment in 2022) serving businesses of all credit profiles with FICO scores as low as 550.

leaders.bg: QuickSpark was founded in 2010 in Phoenix, AZ; acquired by TimePayment in 2022 with 30+ employees forming a dedicated SBU.

name: Braavo Capital
desc: New York-based fintech providing equity-free financing to mobile app developers and publishers, with $2B+ deployed over 10 years and 8,000+ apps funded worldwide.

leaders.bg: Serial entrepreneur who co-founded Braavo in 2015 to provide non-dilutive, performance-based funding for mobile app businesses.
Co-founded Braavo Capital and helped build its technology-driven financing platform for the app economy.

name: Gemini Business Funding
desc: Clearwater, FL-based MCA funder providing same-day or next-day merchant cash advances to businesses based on performance rather than credit scores, with a simple 1-page application.

leaders.bg: Gemini Business Funding was established in 2017 in Clearwater, Florida with approximately 32 employees.

name: SG Credit Partners
desc: Southern California-based family-office backed lender providing $1-$10M+ in situational capital to lower middle market businesses through asset-based revolvers and term loans, with $350M+ deployed.

leaders.bg: 20 years in tech and finance investing; co-founded Bluefin Payment Systems in 2007; previously CFO at Super G Capital before spinning out SGCP in 2018.
Co-led the spin-out of Super G Capital's cash flow and technology division to form SG Credit Partners.

name: Wingspire Capital
desc: Atlanta-area (Alpharetta, GA) senior secured ABL lender providing $20-$200M credit facilities to middle-market businesses, backed by Blue Owl Capital with $3B in capital commitments and $1.6B AUM.

leaders.bg: Co-founded Wingspire in 2019 to provide diversified ABL solutions to middle-market businesses; backed by Blue Owl Capital.
Equipment financing veteran who founded Liberty Commercial Finance (acquired by Wingspire); leads Wingspire Equipment Finance.

name: The Business Backer
desc: Cincinnati, OH-based small business funding company (subsidiary of Enova International/NYSE:ENVA since 2015) providing working capital, receivable financing, and installment loans through funding advisors.

leaders.bg: Turnaround consultant who joined Business Backer in 2009; leads the company as part of Enova International's small business portfolio.
Software and business services entrepreneur who founded The Business Backer in 2007 in Cincinnati.

name: Trustfi
desc: New York-based business funding marketplace matching businesses with 50+ vetted lenders for MCAs, term loans, lines of credit, SBA loans, and equipment financing, with $500M+ facilitated.

leaders.bg: Leads TrustFi's operations connecting businesses with a network of 50+ vetted lending partners.
Background in architecture and finance; brings unique perspective to TrustFi's lending platform operations.

name: QFS Capital
desc: Fort Lauderdale, FL-based small business lender (est. 2019) specializing in cash flow relief, reverse debt consolidation, and merchant cash advances with approvals in under 3 hours.

leaders.bg: Registered agent and financial manager at QFS Capital; oversees operations from Fort Lauderdale office.
Key decision maker in QFS Capital's lending and business development operations.

name: Ansley Park Capital
desc: Equipment and machinery finance company backed by Ares Management ($400M equity), launched in 2024 with former BciCapital team. Focuses on large-ticket, essential-use equipment financing across all 50 states and Canada.

leaders.bg: Former CEO of BCI Capital Corp and President of Asset Finance at CIT Bank. Extensive experience in large-ticket equipment financing and project finance.
Over 40 years in banking and equipment finance. Former CIO at BciCapital, co-head of Wachovia/Wells Fargo equipment finance platform. Held roles at Capital One and New Province Partners.
Over 30 years in financial services. Former Managing Director of Capital Equipment Finance at CIT Group and Chief Commercial Officer at BciCapital.

name: LeasePoint Funding Group
desc: Austin-based fintech specializing in equipment financing with proprietary loan origination and servicing platform featuring automated underwriting and same-day funding. Secured $40M incremental funding from Altriarch Asset Management.

leaders.bg: Founded LeasePoint in 2016, growing it from a small-ticket broker to a national equipment finance platform. Texas A&M BBA graduate. Former Partner at 4 Point Capital Advisors. Inc. 5000 honoree, NextGen 40 Under 40.

10+ years of operations and leadership experience across banking, heavy industry, and tech. Former global commercial credit operations leader at General Electric. Part of executive leadership team at Spruce.

name: Broadway Advance llc
desc: Full-service MCA broker and financial firm founded in 2014, working with 25+ funding companies and syndicate partners. Offers merchant cash advances up to $2M, term loans up to $5M, and various other business financing products.

leaders.bg: Former founding partner at Shield Re-insurance Ltd. Bachelor of Business Administration from SUNY Albany. Launched Broadway Advance in 2014.

name: nFusion Capital LLC
desc: Austin-based private working capital finance company providing accounts receivable financing, inventory financing, PO financing, equipment finance, and asset-based lending. Doubled portfolio past $100M and serves clients nationwide.

leaders.bg: Former EVP at Far West Capital, grew it from small regional practice to national leader. Co-founded Mirabella Estates (sold to Exclusive Resorts in 11 months). Former CFO of Mall.com, raised $7.5M. Started career at Arthur Andersen consulting Fortune 500 companies.

name: Select Funding
desc: Calabasas-based licensed lender providing up to $1M in working capital and equipment financing for small businesses. Founded in 2010 by leasing industry veterans with a customer-focused approach and 24-hour decisioning.

leaders.bg: CEO of Select Funding since 2014. Based in Burbank, California. Select Funding was founded by leasing industry veterans focused on customer-centric equipment financing.

name: Amerifi
desc: Hartford-based direct MCA funder providing working capital from $25K to $7M based on revenue performance. Founded in 2018, offers merchant cash advances, small business loans, and equipment financing with 24-hour funding capability.

leaders.bg: Leads Amerifi Capital with 15+ aggregate years of experience in finance and business lending; built the firm as a direct funder focused on real underwriting.

name: BlueTape
desc: San Francisco fintech providing Buy Now Pay Later and payment solutions for the construction industry. Raised $55M to serve SMBs in construction with 30/60/90-day financing for building materials.

leaders.bg: 12+ years as a licensed general contractor; co-founded and exited cybersecurity company NoPassword; brings deep understanding of construction industry challenges.

MIT undergrad (Math/CS), Wharton MBA. Held senior roles at Wells Fargo, JP Morgan, Goldman Sachs, Visa. Helped found LendingClub and led its investor side. Head of lending at Uplift. Named Top 100 MIT Alumni.

name: GFE
desc: NYC-based direct funder of merchant cash advances founded in 2014, specializing in MCA and reverse consolidation. Provides $2K-$500K in MCA funding and up to $1M in consolidation services to small businesses.

leaders.bg: Founded GFE nearly a decade ago; built it into a recognized leader in the alternative funding industry as a direct MCA funder.
Former Executive Director at JPMorgan Chase overseeing cybersecurity, technology controls, and compliance. 20 years in traditional banking. 30-year friendship with co-founder Musheyev.

name: Tongo Financial, Inc.
desc: New York-based fintech providing a Financial Benefits Platform for real estate brokerages, offering agents commission advances (up to 75% of pending commissions, up to 60 days early) and financial wellness tools. Grew customer base 179% in 2024.

leaders.bg: Co-founded Katapult (NASDAQ: KPLT), a payments company. Cornell Johnson MBA. Previously ran a retail coffee shop in Seattle and residential mortgage brokerage. Met co-founder Luis Scull at ERA accelerator.
Founded Payfully (cash advances for Airbnb hosts). First employee at Open Field Capital, helped grow AUM to $300M over a decade. Previously co-founded Payfully in 2016.
currentHooks: Grew Open Field Capital to $300M AUM

leaders.bg: 20-year product leader at Microsoft, most recently Principal Program Manager for Microsoft 365 for SMB & M365 Lighthouse. Emory University BA in English.

name: TVT Capital
desc: New York-based finance company providing working capital, bridge loans, acquisition financing, MCAs, equipment financing, and commercial real estate loans from $100K to $25M. Operates across all 50 states with flexible 3-24 month terms.

leaders.bg: CEO of TVT Capital since its founding in 2008. Pioneer in bridge loans for small and mid-sized businesses, providing funding from $100K to $25M.
Principal at TVT Capital. Also listed as CEO on some profiles. Long-standing figure in the MCA and alternative lending space.

name: Good Funding
desc: Orange County-based small business lender offering up to $500K in working capital with same-day decisions and next-day funding. Ranked #2 fastest-growing midsize company by OC Business Journal with 650% revenue growth.

leaders.bg: Co-founded Good Funding in 2020. CEO leading the company's alternative funding operations for small businesses in Orange County, CA.
Co-founded Good Funding. Previously held roles at National Funding, Quick Bridge Funding, and Five Point Capital. Experienced in alternative business financing.

name: Targeted Lending Co., LLC
desc: Buffalo-based equipment finance company with 25+ years of experience, offering $5K-$400K in equipment and vehicle financing. Recently expanded Wells Fargo credit facility to $125M, demonstrating strong institutional backing.

leaders.bg: 25+ years building and managing profitable equipment finance companies; previously at M&C Leasing, Evans Bank, and Blue Bridge Financial; expert in portfolio management and risk modeling.

name: Advantage Merchant Funding
desc: Manhattan-based fintech offering merchant cash advances and customized business funding solutions. Provides fast approvals with no credit score minimums, including subprime and no-credit-check MCA options with same-day deposits.

leaders.bg: Leads Advantage Merchant Funding as one of Manhattan's fastest-growing fintech companies providing MCA and business funding solutions.

name: Aztec Financial
desc: Utah-based commercial financing company founded in 1997, specializing in equipment financing for cleaning, restoration, and related industries. Acquired by Taycor Financial in 2021, offering working capital, equipment finance, and MCAs.

leaders.bg: Co-founded Aztec Financial in 1997 with the Hanks brothers. Led the company as President/CFO through its growth as a leading equipment finance provider for specialty contractors. Company acquired by Taycor Financial/North Mill in 2021.

name: Blueline Capital Group
desc: Manhattan-based BBB-accredited small business lender offering MCA, business loans, SBA bridge loans, equipment financing, and lines of credit. Known for same-day deposits and instant pre-approvals.

leaders.bg: 30 years in manufacturing of machined parts before transitioning to financial services. Former Loan Officer at GMAC ResCap. Based in Hollister, California.

name: Centra Funding, LLC
desc: Plano-based equipment finance company founded in 2006, known as '4-Hour Funding.' Subsidiary of CV Holdings; recently acquired LeaseQ's Restaurant and Franchise Team. Benefits from 40+ years of management experience.

leaders.bg: Founded Centra Funding in 2006. 29+ years in the leasing industry. Also President of 4 Hour Funding. Member of AACFB Industry Advisory Council 2024-2025. Centra is subsidiary of CV Holdings.

name: Funderial LLC
desc: NYC-based technology-enabled direct MCA lender and financial marketplace (formerly Imperial Advance). Offers merchant cash advances, loans, lines of credit, and equipment financing through 160+ lending partners.

leaders.bg: Managing Member of Funderial based in Midtown Manhattan. Pace University graduate. Oversees strategic direction and daily operations.
Senior executive at Funderial overseeing business development and lending partner relationships.

name: GoKapital
desc: Miami-based alternative lender providing business loans ($20K-$50M), commercial real estate financing, and hard money loans nationwide. Founded in 2013, serves businesses that cannot qualify at traditional banks with 24-hour approvals.

leaders.bg: Co-founded GoKapital with brother Oliver Moreno. Based in Miami. Previous experience at BlackRock, Finacity Corporation, and US Department of Labor. Named National Financial Services CEO of the Year 2023.

name: InterNex Capital
desc: Harrison, NY-based asset-based digital lender providing revolving lines of credit ($100K-$10M) to SMBs. Surpassed $2B in total funding using proprietary Velocity platform for automated invoice-to-cash processes.

leaders.bg: Co-founded InterNex Capital in 2015. Former VP and Head of Global Corporate Receivables Programs at ICE. Former CEO of Working Capital Solutions at GE Capital. Led InterNex past $2B in SMB funding.

name: Lendinero
desc: Miami-based fintech marketplace providing bilingual (English/Spanish) business financing for Latino-owned and minority-owned small businesses. Founded in 2013 with proprietary automated loan application platform connecting borrowers to multiple lenders.

leaders.bg: Founded Lendinero in 2014 to address the capital access gap for Latino-owned businesses. Grew revenues 400%+ and net revenues 900%+. Featured in Forbes, Entrepreneur, deBanked. Over $10M delivered to small businesses, 80%+ Latino-owned.

name: Mr Advance
desc: Astoria, NY-based direct MCA lender utilizing fintech for streamlined alternative business lending. Offers MCAs, SBA loans, lines of credit, invoice factoring, and collateralized loans as a direct lender.

leaders.bg: CEO of Mr Advance based in NYC. Former roles at Citi Capital LLC and Yellowstone Capital (A Fundry Brand). Company is a direct lender using fintech for alternative business lending.

name: Par Funding
desc: Philadelphia-based MCA lender that was shut down following SEC action and $550M fraud investigation. Founders ordered to pay $219M in restitution for unregistered securities used to finance high-fee merchant lending.

leaders.bg: Former co-founder of Par Funding (Complete Business Solutions Group). Pled guilty to RICO conspiracy, securities fraud, and related crimes in connection with $500M fraudulent investment scheme. Sentenced to 13.5-15.5 years imprisonment.
Former co-founder of Par Funding and wife of Joseph LaForte. Claimed net worth of nearly $800M at one point. Involved in SEC fraud case involving nearly $500M in misleading investors.

name: TMC Community Capital
desc: California-based nonprofit CDFI microlender providing $5K-$50K affordable loans to underserved small businesses, especially women-owned and minority-owned. Has lent $9M+ across California with 82% of loans supporting entrepreneurs of color.

leaders.bg: Founded TMC Community Capital in 2018 and TMC Financing in 1981. TMC Financing is now the largest CDC in the nation for SBA 504 loans. Bay Area business and civic leader. Disbursed $7M+ to ~350 businesses, 82% to entrepreneurs of color.

First full-time CEO of TMC CC. Born in East San Jose. Former VP of community development at USC Credit Union focusing on South Central LA. Former small business banker at Chase creating nonprofit partnerships. Previously at Mobility Capital Finance fintech.

name: Wall Street Funding
desc: New York-based small business lender founded in 2009, providing funding against future business cash flow. A+ BBB rated with 50+ years of combined management experience, having funded 10,000+ small businesses.

leaders.bg: Founded Wall Street Funding in 2010 as one of the nation's fastest-growing small business lenders. Also founded Onyx IQ (fintech platform). In alternative funding/MCA/B2B space since 2006. Also co-founder of Big Think Capital.

name: LiftForward, Inc.
desc: NYC-based embedded finance platform providing BNPL, split-pay, and subscription financing programs for brands, merchants, and banks across 15+ countries. Raised $405M with partnerships including Microsoft and Apple.

leaders.bg: Founded LiftForward in 2013. Built embedded lending fintech platform operating in 15+ countries. Partnership with Microsoft and MasterCard. Private equity backed software company powering subscription services and Hardware as a Service.

name: Regium Funding
desc: Fort Lauderdale-based MCA funder offering flexible business financing with fees starting at 1% per week. Since 2020, has funded $100M+ to 10,000+ businesses nationwide with A+ BBB rating and pay-as-you-go model.

leaders.bg: CEO and co-founder of Regium Funding, founded in 2020. Baruch College BBA in Marketing. Led company to $500M revenue in 2024 with 150% YoY growth. Based in Fort Lauderdale.

name: Prime Financial Technologies
desc: NYC-based fintech providing embedded lending platform for community banks and small businesses. Founded in 2022 as Enigma spinoff with $53M from NEA, Third Point, Capital One, and Customers Bank.

leaders.bg: Co-founded Enigma Technologies in 2012 and served as CEO. Columbia University graduate. Co-founded Prime Financial Technologies in 2022 as a spin-off from Enigma. Raised $49M initial funding with Capital One Ventures as investor.

name: Big Think Capital Inc.
desc: Melville, NY-based direct lender and marketplace offering MCAs, term loans, lines of credit, SBA loans, and equipment financing up to $2M. A+ BBB rated with 2,000+ five-star Trustpilot reviews and 98% positive rating.

leaders.bg: Started career as attorney, transitioned to mortgage banking then financial sales before founding Big Think Capital. Company ranked #19 on Fortune's Best Small Workplaces 2025 and #30 on Fortune's Best Small/Medium Workplaces in Financial Services 2025.

name: CLARIFY CAPITAL II LLC d/b/a Clarify Capital
desc: NYC-based boutique lending firm co-founded in 2017, securing $700M+ in funding for small businesses. Offers instant approval with 2-minute applications and next-day funding across term loans, MCAs, lines of credit, and SBA loans.

leaders.bg: Co-founded Clarify Capital in 2017 with Bryan Gerson. Leads a boutique lending firm working with 75+ lenders to secure competitive funding for SMBs nationwide.
Co-founded Clarify Capital in 2017. Leads research initiatives including the 2025 SMB Recession Readiness Report surveying 300 entrepreneurs.
